**2.0.1 (2016-11-06)**

* Fix the README.rst example

**2.0.0 (2016-11-06)**

* Update command option and incompatible
* Update ignore begin / from ignore
* Update ignore directory needs end with / (or \)
* Add support for multi target dirs
* Add support for .cleanignore file

**1.0.0 (2016-11-03)**

* Initial release
